(209 x 126 x 26mm) |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "2060500338" is silkscreened on the board top.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 256MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *LAN: 4x GbE PoE+ (RJ45) ports, 4x GbE (RJ45) ports *PoE: 802.3af, 802.3at (PoE+), 62W PoE budget *Power: 53.5V 1.31A via barrel *16Gbps switching capacity
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-sg2008p |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = PoE+ available on ports 1-4 }} Please insert instructions here
